sections.heading: Overview
content:
Ed Stewart is the senior content manager for WebMD, governing the use of
assets on WebMD's consumer web sites. Before joining WebMD in 1998, he was a
CD-ROM and print media project manager with A.D.A.M. Software.

Mr. Stewart began his career as a medical illustrator, creating
demonstrative evidence illustrations for personal injury and medical
malpractice trials. He left the medical-legal field to illustrate for the
health education markets, contributing to numerous consumer health products and
anatomy tutorials for graduate programs.

A graduate of Case Western Reserve University, Stewart earned a bachelor's
degree in medical illustration and a master's degree in art education.
© 2005 - 2026 WebMD LLC, an Internet Brands company. All rights reserved. WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. See additional information.
